name: Pod Rabbit
description:
In Night City, what makes someone a criminal? Getting Carrots!

Learn to pilot your stolen racing pod and grab all the carrot boxes in as little time as possible!

Controls:

  • Hold Z to accelerate your left thruster. Hold A for turbo!
  • Hold M to accelerate your right thruster. Hold K for turbo!
  • Use both thrusters at the same time to move forward, only one to rotate.
  • Beware of crashing when using turbo!

Keypad controls:

  • Hold 1 to accelerate your left thruster. Hold 4 for turbo!
  • Hold 3 to accelerate your right thruster. Hold 6 for turbo!

Created for the Nokia 3310 JAM 5 #nokiajam

Credits:

  • Concept/Programming: Francisco Casas
  • Music/SFX: Martin Andrade

Extras:

  • You can press P to add separation between the pixels.
